snippet: Andre Villas-Boas was given a chance to make amends for his first failed effort in English football management after being named coach of Tottenham Hotspur on Tuesday.
abstract: Tottenham Hotspur hires Andre Villas-Boas as head coach; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Andre Villas-Boas was given a chance to make amends for his first failed effort in English football management after being named coach of Tottenham Hotspur on Tuesday.

headline.seo: Tottenham Names Andre Villas-Boas as New Coach
headline.main: Tottenham Names Villas-Boas as New Coach
